title.en: Kissing-Obsessed Psycho and a Smoking Cat

altTitles.en: They are not kissing and a cat

description.en:
Hee-Yul Yoon has just moved back from America to Korea with her sister, Suh Hee Yoon. She is determined to deal with her hard past by leaving behind her aunt, uncle and her friend Ricky Ha. After buying a pack of cigarettes she bumps into a handsome boy. And then all of a sudden he kisses her! Who is this annoying bastard and what's his deal?! You had better believe that our heroine Hee-Yul will get to the bottom of this!

description.fr:
Hee-Yul Yoon vient juste de quitter la Corée avec sa sœur pour aller vivre en Amérique. Elle espère pouvoir laisser derrière elle son passé. Un jour, alors qu'elle achète un paquet de cigarette, elle tombe sur un homme séduisant. Le hic, c'est qu'il l'embrasse! Que veut-il donc ?

description.ko:
희율선배에게 필이 팍!! 꽂힌 완벽 인기남 "최이현"
두 번 다시 사랑따윈 안하겠다며 아픈 상처가 남아있는 그녀에게
집착이라해도 좋을 거침없는 무대포 사랑을 쏟아낸다!!

biography.en: Not an actual artist, but a pseudonym created by the Korean magazine Kkotnim to publish a mass amount of "house style" manhwa.
Not an actual artist, but a pseudonym created by the Korean magazine Kkotnim to publish a mass amount of "house style" manhwa.
